title: Incorrect example in CHANGES.txt
description: for the explanation for SOLR-2438, <fieldType="multiterm"> should read <analyzer type="multiterm">

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Fixed in trunk, r: 1330327

Added to errata page for 3.6 here: https://wiki.apache.org/solr/Solr3.6#preview
